hadiths.text: Uthman b. Abu al-'As reported that he came to Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) and he narrated like this. In the hadith transmitted on the authority of Salam b. Nuh there is no mention of three times

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّعَوُّذِ مِنْ شَيْطَانِ الْوَسْوَسَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge With Allah From The Devil Who Whispers During Prayer
